thread.title: Fergie to expand family post new album`s completion
thread.title_full: Fergie to expand family post new album`s completion

title: Fergie to expand family post new album`s completion
text:
Fergie to expand family post new album`s completion 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Sunday 18th October, 2015 
Fergie revealed that she and her beloved husband Josh Duhamel, who are parents to 2-year-old son Axl, are definitely planning on expanding their family, but before this she wants to complete her upcoming album and tour. 
On being asked whether she's wishing for a daughter for the second time or not, the 'Big Girl's Don't Cry' hit-maker explained that she would love to have a daughter, but will be happier to give her little girl her own fragrance collection, E! Online reported. 
The American singer added that she either wanted her new album or a second kid and among this she went for an album as according to her, she can't hold on to a song for long. 
Notably, the 40-year-old singer will soon be coming up with her new sophomore album, which is a follow-up to her 2006 debut, The Dutchess, and after releasing that she will be off to her music tour.
